title: Scooby Doo
creator_credit: Raja Gosnell, Richard Suckle, Charles Roven, Mosaic Media Group and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Two years after a clash of egos forced Mystery Inc. to close its doors, Scooby-Doo and his clever crime-solving cohorts Fred, Daphne, Shaggy and Velma are individually summoned to Spooky Island to investigate a series of paranormal incidents at the ultra-hip Spring Break hot spot. Cast includes Freddie Prinze Jr, Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Linda Cardellini, Rowan Atkinson, Miguel A. Nunez Jr, Isla Fisher.
